property.name: Type
property.value: L1 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Climb. At the start of your Main Phase, you may exhaust a location on your side. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Beast. Animal Agility. [AnyTurn]Combat[SKILL]: Beast gets +1/+1 this combat for each +1/+1 counter on him. Big Blue Brain. Level Up(3) - When Beast Climbs a Laboratory, he gains 1 XP.

property.name: Type
property.value: L2 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Climb to Die. At the start of your Main Phase, you may exhaust a location on your side. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Beast and he gets Ferocious and Lethal this turn. Animal Agility. [AnyTurn]Combat[SKILL]: Beast gets +1/+1 this combat for each +1/+1 counter on him.

property.name: Type
property.value: L1 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unpredictable. [AnyTurn]Combat[SKILL]: Deadpool gets one of the following this combat, at random: +4/+0, +2/+2, +0/+4. Death Follows Me. Level Up(4) - When a character gets KO'd, Deadpool gains 1 XP.

property.name: Type
property.value: L2 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unpredictable. [AnyTurn]Combat[SKILL]: Deadpool gets one of the following this combat, at random: +4/+0, +2/+2, +0/+4. Mister Assassin. [AnyTurn]Combat[MIGHT]: KO an enemy supporting character in the combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: L1 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bone Claws. [AnyTurn]Combat[MIGHT]: Wolverine gets +2/+0 this combat. Lone Wolf. Level Up(3) - When Wolverine makes a solo attack, he gains 1 XP.

property.value: L2 Main Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Adamantium Claws. [AnyTurn]Combat[MIGHT]: Wolverine gets +6/+0 this combat. A New Family. Main[INTELLECT]: While team attacking this turn, characters on your side have Berserker and can't be struck.

property.value: X-Factor Detection. Main[INTELLECT]: Put two +1/+1 counters on each other [Brotherhood of Mutants] and [Xmen] character on your side.

property.value: Air Superiority. Characters with [Flight] can't strike Angel.

property.value: Butterfly Knife. When Psylocke attacks a character on an enemy player's side, that player discards a plot twist. If they don't have one, they reveal their hand.

property.value: Supporting Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Berserker. When Wolverine attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on him. Fearless. While attacking a main character, Wolverine strikes with double his ATK.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scared Stiff. Main[SKILL]: Enemy characters can't use super powers until your next turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Supporting Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Impulsive. When Deadpool appears or recovers, he strikes an enemy supporting character. Tough. When Deadpool gets stunned, you may recover him. (He still gets wounded.)

property.value: Lady Luck. [Anytime]Combat[INTELLECT]: Roll a die. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Domino.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Not Mde of Steel, Made of Rage. [Anytime]Combat[MIGHT]: Colossus gets +3/+3 this combat. If he's wounded, he gets +6/+6 instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Supporting Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrical Field. When Storm enters combat, put a -1/-1 counter on each enemy character in the combat. Atomkinesis [AnyTurn]Combat[ENERGY]: Double the -1/-1 counters on each enemy character in the combat. Storm can use this power any number of times each turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Supporting Character

property.name: Rules
property.value: AKA Jean Grey, Phoenix. Tapping Into Her Power. When Marvel Girl appears, choose a character on your side to get +10/+10 this turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Plot Twist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mutant Loyalty. Put this in your deck only if each card with a team and each character in your deck is [Brotherhood of Mutants] and/or [Xmen]. One of a Kind. You may only have one of this card in your deck. Build: Characters can't attack until your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Standard Issue. You pay 1 less to play this if you equip it to an [Xmen] character. Basic Protection. Equipped character has +2/+2.
